channel.title: Good, cheap web hosts
channel.description: I'm looking at getting a website for a MineCraft server. I've found a host that is £21.80 a year, but it doesn't allow external MySQL connections. I'd prefer to have that ability, so I'm looking for another host. Can someone please give me a host with a similar price, that gives a domain and external MySQL connections?

item.title: Good, cheap web hosts
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“Ambokile, post:3, topic:540007”]I found a VPS for €11.90 per month. 2048 MB guaranteed RAM, 8192 MB burst RAM. How is that for my needs?[/quote]It seems good, CPU speed also matters though as does band-width. Your domain will probably be paid separately from your VPS.

Read full topic

item.title: Good, cheap web hosts
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

If you have a VPS set up just buy a regular domain and point it to your VPS.

Read full topic
